main event: An 11-year-old observer reported seeing a bright object with several lights in the sky over Dayton, Ohio, for about 30 minutes.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on September 27, 1968, in a backyard field east of Route 77., The object was described as having multiple lights and moving in a northerly direction., The witness was a child, along with a friend aged 10 who was with him at the time., No photographs or physical evidence were documented or found., The Air Force responded to the report asking for additional information for further investigation.
sighted object: a bright object with several lights
